title: Tottenham's Georges-Kevin N'Koudou set for Burnley loan
description: Tottenham winger Georges-Kevin N'Koudou is set to join Burnley on loan for the rest of the season, Sky Sports News understands.
content: The 22-year-old Frenchman will undergo a medical in the north-west on Tuesday and could be available for the Clarets' next Premier League clash with Crystal Palace at the weekend.N'Koudou has struggled to make an impact over 18 months at Spurs and is in need of regular games.He has made 23 appearances since arriving from Marseille in 2016 but never started a Premier League match.N'Koudou's one and only start this season came in the Champions League game against APOEL at Wembley in December when he scored in a 3-0 win.He also came on for 12 minutes in the FA Cup tie against AFC Wimbledon on Sunday, which Spurs also won 3-0, and his chances for games this term was not helped by an injury suffered against Newcastle on the opening day.N'Koudou signed for a fee of around Â£11m in a deal that saw Clinton NJie move to the French club on loan.
